description.narrative: FMO’s funding will be used for the construction of the Project for a total amount of more than USD 100mln. FMO will invest ca. USD 25mln in the Project; partner investors will fund the remainder. The Project will sell its electricity under a Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) to Electricite de Djibouti, the Djibouti state-owned utility. Please note, FMO has already funded ca. USD 1mln to finance the development phase of the Project. Development has now been finalized and construction will commence.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
